data.comment: The big names in today's match at Guldensporenstadion have now been confirmed.
The match has started, with Oostende kicking-off.
In the minute 4, Goal! Kortrijk take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Gilles Dewaele.
Cameron McGeehan is booked for the away team.
Andrew Hjulsager levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Guldensporenstadion.
The second half is underway in Kortrijk - Kortrijk with the kick-off.
Goal! Kortrijk have got their heads in front thanks to a Habib Gueye strike.
In the minute 57, At Guldensporenstadion, Andrew Hjulsager has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Francois Marquet is on a sub for Cameron McGeehan for Oostende.
Oostende make their second substitution with Nick Batzner replacing Maxime D'Arpino.
In the minute 77, Jack Hendry (Oostende) gets a yellow card.
Ilombe Mboyo puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-1.
The home team replace Habib Gueye with Faiz Selemani.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
